name: prompt-shield
description: Prompt quality management skill with 8-Point Quality Check, LINT/BUILD modes, Intercept Pipeline, and advanced guides (Extended Thinking, Prefill, Token Efficiency).
short_description: Prompt QA skill (8-Point Check + LINT + BUILD + Intercept)
author: joseph0926
features: 8-Point Quality Check (ROLE, CONTEXT, INSTRUCTION, EXAMPLE, FORMAT, SUCCESS_CRITERIA + STATE_TRACKING, TOOL_USAGE)
LINT Mode - Diagnose and improve existing prompts
BUILD Mode - Design new prompts from requirements
Intercept Pipeline - Real-time prompt improvement with -r (review) and -a (auto) flags
Extended Thinking guide for complex reasoning tasks
Prefill Response technique for output format enforcement
Test case generation (normal, edge, injection defense)
MCP Prompt Registry: saved prompts exposed as slash commands (prompts/list, prompts/get)
